mapper.select: SELECT CE.TIPO_HOSPITAL AS TIPO_HOSPITAL, CE.CLUSTER_HOSPITAL AS CLUSTER_HOSPITAL, CE.VALOR_ORIGINAL AS VALOR_ORIGINAL, CE.VALOR_CORREGIDO AS VALOR_CORREGIDO, CE.CORRECCION AS CORRECCION, CE.INDICADOR_ID AS INDICADOR_ID, 'variable'||VIC1.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID||'.codigo'||VIC1.CODIGO AS TIPO_HOSPITAL_DESC, 'variable'||VIC2.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID||'.codigo'||VIC2.CODIGO AS CLUSTER_HOSPITAL_DESC, H.DESCRIPCION AS NOMBRE_HOSPITAL, H.CODIGO_HOSPITAL AS CODIGO_HOSPITAL, 'variable3'||'.codigo'||C.CODIGO_CCAA AS CODIGO_CCAA, 'variable3'||'.codigo'||C.CODIGO_CCAA AS DESC_CCAA, CE.ANIO AS ANIO FROM MD_CORRECCION_INDIVIDUAL CE, MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC1, MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC2, MD_HOSPITALES H, MD_CCAA C, MD_PROVINCIAS P WHERE VIC1.CODIGO LIKE CE.TIPO_HOSPITAL AND VIC2.CODIGO LIKE CE.CLUSTER_HOSPITAL AND VIC1.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = 1 AND VIC2.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = 12 AND CE.CODIGO_HOSPITAL = H.CODIGO_HOSPITAL AND H.PROVINCIA_HOSPITAL = P.CODIGO_PROVINCIA AND P.CODIGO_CCAA = C.CODIGO_CCAA AND CE.INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} CE.ANIO = #{anio}

SELECT TIPO_HOSPITAL, CLUSTER_HOSPITAL, VALOR_ORIGINAL, VALOR_CORREGIDO, CORRECCION, INDICADOR_ID, VIC1.VALOR AS TIPO_HOSPITAL_DESC, VIC2.VALOR AS CLUSTER_HOSPITAL_DESC, H.DESCRIPCION AS NOMBRE_HOSPITAL, H.CODIGO_HOSPITAL AS CODIGO_HOSPITAL, C.CODIGO_CCAA AS CODIGO_CCAA, C.DESCRIPCION AS DESC_CCAA, CE.ANIO AS ANIO FROM MD_CORRECCION_INDIVIDUAL CE, MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC1, MD_VARS_INF_CODIGOS VIC2, MD_HOSPITALES H, MD_CCAA C, MD_PROVINCIAS P WHERE VIC1.CODIGO LIKE CE.TIPO_HOSPITAL AND VIC2.CODIGO LIKE CE.CLUSTER_HOSPITAL AND VIC1.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = 1 AND VIC2.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = 12 AND CE.CODIGO_HOSPITAL = H.CODIGO_HOSPITAL AND H.PROVINCIA_HOSPITAL = P.CODIGO_PROVINCIA AND P.CODIGO_CCAA = C.CODIGO_CCAA
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MD_CORRECCION_INDIVIDUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_CORRECCION_INDIVIDUAL ( TIPO_HOSPITAL, CLUSTER_HOSPITAL, VALOR_ORIGINAL, VALOR_CORREGIDO, CORRECCION, INDICADOR_ID, ANIO ) VALUES ( #{tipoHospital}, #{clusterHospital}, #{valorOriginal}, #{valorCorregido}, #{correccion}, #{indicadorId}, #{anio} )
